Name: Epic Dumpster Bear: Dumpster Fire Redux
About the game: An evil corporation destroyed his forest, now it's his turn to take out the trash Epic Dumpster Bear is an action packed platformer inspired by the 16-bit classics where you play as a dumpster bear with a chip on his shoulder. Over 65 levels filled with tricky platforming, challenging bosses, and secret levels to be discovered. The 'Epic Dumpster Bear: Dumpster Fire Redux' edition is the director's cut of the cult indie hit with new levels and more cinematics exploring dumpster bear's past. Classic platforming action 7 worlds and over 65 levels to complete Smooth gameplay and precise control Secret Exits and Levels to be discovered
